title: I have not received a confirmation SMS/WhatsApp/Email. Please help! : BookMyShow Support Centre
body:
We're glad to be of service!
Once the booking is confirmed, you'll see the tickets under 'Your Orders' on the website/app. Also, you'll get an SMS/WhatsApp as well as an Email confirmation.
If this doesn't work, just visit our website and find 'Resend Booking Confirmation' toward the bottom of the home page and get it resend.
If you've done the above and received an error as displayed below, the transaction couldn't be completed. In case of being charged, you'll receive a complete refund within a maximum of 10 working days.
Still, facing a concern? Hit us up over
LIVE CHAT.
